author: Morgan Winsor
title: Coronavirus live updates: FDA gives drugs emergency approval to treat COVID-19
description: A pandemic of the novel coronavirus has claimed the lives of more than 34,000 people across the globe.
content:
A pandemic of the novel coronavirus has claimed the lives of more than 34,000 people across the globe.
The new respiratory virus, which causes an illness known officially as COVID-19, has rapidly spread to every continent except Antartica since first emergin… [+2571 chars]
